modName: Boethiah's Calling Ebony Blade of Sacrifice Replacer by Standalone09
summary: Replaces the Ebony Blade of Sacrifice from the Quest Boethia´s Calling with a Completely new Model/Textures made from scratch.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://picload.org/image/plwwric/screenshot001.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]https://picload.org/image/iwdgioc/divider.png[/img][/center]

[center][youtube]oqseYvO1IRU[/youtube]
[youtube]CVCzK3FQdxU[/youtube][/center]

[font=Garamond][color=#d8d8d8][size=5]Description:[/size][/color][/font]

Basically this Mod replaces the Ebony Blade of Sacrifice from the Questline Boethia´s Calling with a Completely new Model + Textures made from scratch.

Hope you like the Mod as much as i enjoyed making it Have Fun! :)

[font=Garamond][color=#d8d8d8][size=5]Install:[/size][/color][/font]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your Skyrim Data folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Ebony Ceremonial Blade Replacer by Standalone09.esp

[font=Garamond][color=#d8d8d8][size=5]Uninstall:[/size][/color][/font]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[center][img]https://picload.org/image/iwdgioc/divider.png[/img][/center]




Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: Standalone09
